fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2022e2.equipments.indoorgarden.mil

Class IndoorGardenCoupledModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.Model
      • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.CoupledModel
        • fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2022e2.equipments.indoorgarden.mil.IndoorGardenCoupledModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.interfaces.ModelDescriptionI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.interfaces.ParentNotificationI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.interfaces.VariableInitialisationI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.interfaces.CoupledModelI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.interfaces.ModelI, java.io.Serializable

    public class IndoorGardenCoupledModel
extends fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.CoupledModel
    The class IndoorGardenCoupledModel implements the DEVS coupled model for the indoor simulator.

    Description

    This model is only used to perform unit tests on the indoor garden simulation models, hence it is kept to a minimal implementation.

    Invariant

     invariant       true        // no more invariants

    Created on : 2022-10-04

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • IndoorGardenCoupledModel

        public IndoorGardenCoupledModel(java.lang.String uri,
                                java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit simulatedTimeUnit,
                                fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.simulators.interfaces.SimulatorI simulationEngine,
                                fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.interfaces.ModelDescriptionI[] submodels,
                                java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<? extends fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.events.EventI>,fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.events.EventSink[]> imported,
                                java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<? extends fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.events.EventI>,fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.events.ReexportedEvent> reexported,
                                java.util.Map<fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.events.EventSource,fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.events.EventSink[]> connections)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        creating the coupled model instance.

        Contract

         pre     true        // no more precondition.
 post    true        // no more postcondition.
        Parameters:
        uri - URI of the coupled model to be created.
        simulatedTimeUnit - time unit used in the simulation by the model.
        simulationEngine - simulation engine enacting the model.
        submodels - array of submodels of the new coupled model.
        imported - map from imported event types to submodels consuming them.
        reexported - map from event types exported by submodels that are reexported by this coupled model.
        connections - map connecting event sources to arrays of event sinks among submodels.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.
